EmailTemplate.subject: Be Curious at H.O.M.E. by Martell
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<!--
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[http://www.martell.com/en-ww/]]>
Be Curious at H.O.M.E. by Martell
Take a step beyond appearances and allow yourself to Be Curious at the House of Martell Entertainment.
Visit the Martell H.O.M.E. pop-up and experience a myriad of puzzles, secret room, and optical illusions that are sure to astonish and bemuse. Better yet, come with a friend and enjoy a Martell cocktail on the house.
And for a deeper appreciation of cognac, join Martell brand ambassador Pierre Boyer in the Be Curious mentoring workshop, or the Be Curious dinner by Chef Nathalie, followed by a hands-on cocktail-making session.
Find out more <[[https://www.martell.com/en-my/martell-home/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=martell_edm]]>
H.O.M.E around the globe
The House Of Martell Entertainment is where you can reignite your spirit of curiosity through food, music, and mixology.
For a preview of what's coming soon to KL, check out H.O.M.E. in Los Angeles.
Watch <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8iKeBralV3c]]>
